label: A4B2C3_tP72_77_8d_ab2c2d_6d-001
title: Gwihabaite (NH$_{4}$NO$_{3}$ V) Structure
comments:
Ammonium nitrate exists in a variety of forms, (Hermann, 1937) depending on the temperature: \begin{tabular}{ccccc} \\ Phase & Temperature $^{\circ}$C & {\em Strukturbericht} & Page \\ \hline I & 125 -- 170 & $G0_{8}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cP2_221_a_b-001}{AB\_cP2\_221\_a\_b-001} \\ II & 84 -- 125 & $G0_{9}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_tP10_100_b_a_bc-001}{ABC3\_tP10\_100\_b\_a\_bc-001} \\ III & 32 -- 84 & $G0_{10}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_oP20_62_c_c_cd-002}{ABC3\_oP20\_62\_c\_c\_cd-002} \\ IV & -18 -- 32 & $G0_{11}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B2C3_oP18_59_ef_ab_ae-001}{A4B2C3\_oP18\_59\_ef\_ab\_af-001} \\ V & $< -18$ & & \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B2C3_tP72_77_8d_ab2c2d_6d-001}{A4B2C3\_tP72\_77\_8d\_ab2c2d\_6d2-001} & (this structure) \end{tabular} 
 Data for this structure was taken at $-150^{\circ}$C.
